english_example_sentence: If we sit in the front row, we'll hear the concert clearly.
russian_example_sentence: Если мы сядем в первом ряду, мы будем четко слышать концерт.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz ön sıraya oturursak, konseri net duyarız.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz ön sıraya ______, konseri net duyarız.
